welcome_message_body: Welcome to Nyala, Sudan! Get ready to experience the warm hospitality and vibrant culture of this beautiful city, known for its bustling markets and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Nyala has to offer.

restaurants.name: Take Away | تيك أواى (تيك أواي)
restaurants.description: Take Away | تيك أواى (تيك أواي) is a fast food restaurant located in Nyala.
